#Objects

p1 point
la line
lb line
pa point
pb point
c1 circle
ca circle
cb circle
pc point

l1a line
l1b line
lac line
lbc line


#Relations

start_point(p1,la)
start_point(p1,lb)

not parallel(la, lb)

centre(p1,c1)

coincident(pa, la)
coincident(pb, lb)

coincident(pa, c1)
coincident(pb, c1)

centre(pa,ca)
centre(pb,cb)

coincident(p1, ca)
coincident(p1, cb)

not equal(p1,pc)
coincident(pc, ca)
coincident(pc, cb)

end_points(l1a, p1, pa)
end_points(l1b, p1, pb)
end_points(lac, pa, pc)
end_points(lbc, pb, pc)

length_equal(l1a, l1b)
length_equal(lac, lbc)
